Actions.ActionName: SWITCH:  Based on FrontMost App NAME

Actions.Title: %ExecutingMacro%
Actions.Text:
This Macro is designed to work with Finder, Path Finder, and ForkLift.
The FrontMost app is %Application%1%

To use with this App, you must first select the text of the File (or Folder) Name, but NOT the extension, and then click on the "Continue" button.

Otherwise, click "Stop" to CANCEL this Macro

Actions.ActionName: PAUSE:  0.15 sec to Ensure App has Time to Select Text of File Name
IF:  Other App is FrontMost, do NOT Type RETURN

Name: Replace Spaces with Dashes in File Name in @Finder and Other Apps  [Example]
